sentences.sentence: He prohibited backbenchers from crafting legislation.
sentences.translation: 他还禁止后座议员参在法律制定上玩花样。

sentences.sentence: SOME will become fiery backbenchers; others are doomed to obscurity or scandal.
sentences.translation: 在新入选的227名国会议员中，有一些会成为言语犀利的后座议员;其他的注定的要碌碌无为，甚至卷入丑闻。

sentences.sentence: Securing supplies, on the other hand, has more appeal among the backbenchers.
sentences.translation: 保障供给，另一方面，对普通议员有更大吸引力。
